snippet.textDisplay:
To clarify. We are tirelessly checking for updates on this situation and reporting it to you the Same hour it is released. As mentioned in the video, This is not confirmed. This is all alleged by sources close to Amber Heard & Johnny Depp/other. Our goal is to be the first channel to report the news on this matter so as time moves forward, these rumors can be proven to be true or false.

With that said, We have taken down 4 of our videos that contained rumors that were proven to be inaccurate.

We will continue to check every hour of the day to keep you guys updated on the situation. Thanks for watching <3
- The Viral Vision Team

snippet.textDisplay:
A big thank to all my fans!what will my name and career be without all of your love and support?
Amidst my darkest days you all stood by me,I don't have all the time in the world to reply,but I do read all your heartwarming comments and truly appreciate all. it's because the of love and so I decided to put a smile on the face of my fans by going through my old posts on my official page and hitting up random fans,so I can get to relate with my fans better through discussion of depth and humour, listening to compliment and criticism on my career walk.
Kindly text me on Hangouts here is my email
Johnnydepp5004@gmail.com
God bless you and to thank you once again for the love and support ❤️❤️❤️
